sourcesContent:
<template>
    eve
</template>

<script>
import { collection, getDocs } from 'firebase/firestore';
import { db } from '../../firebase/firebase';

export default {
    name: "EventiView",
    data() {
        return {
            eventi: []
        }
    },
    methods: {
        async fetchEventi() {
            const eventiRef = collection(db, "eventi")
            const snapshot = await getDocs(eventiRef)

            this.eventi = snapshot.docs.map((evento) => ({
                eventoId: evento.id,
                ...evento.data()
            }))
        }
    }
}
</script>
